trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> class is a collection of service principal names that represent a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> クラスは、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> の構成要素を表すサービス プリンシパル名のコレクションです。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to add to this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> に追加する <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> メソッドは、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスをこの <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> に追加します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method ignores a duplicate name provided in the `element` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A>メソッドで提供される重複した名前は無視、`element`パラメーター。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class is a collection of Service Principal Names (SPNs) that represent a configuration element for an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection>クラスは、コレクションの構成要素を表すサービス プリンシパル名 (Spn) の<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>です。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Clear" /> method removes all configuration element objects from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Clear" /> メソッドは、この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> からすべての構成要素オブジェクトを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to retrieve the index of in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 内のインデックスを取得する <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.IndexOf(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method retrieves the index of the specified configuration element in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.IndexOf(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> メソッドは、この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> 内の指定された構成要素の位置を示すインデックスを取得します。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 内の指定された <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> のインデックス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item" /> プロパティは、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを取得または設定します。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 内の <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンスのインデックス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> プロパティは、指定されたインデックスの位置にある <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを取得または設定します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求された <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンス。

trans-unit.source: If the requested instance is not found, then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 要求されたインスタンスが見つからない場合は、<see langword="null" /> が返されます。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.String" /> 内の <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを表す <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance based on a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> プロパティは、<see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを表す文字列に基づいて <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを取得または設定します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求された <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンス。

trans-unit.source: If the requested instance is not found, then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 要求されたインスタンスが見つからない場合は、<see langword="null" /> が返されます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove" /> メソッドは、この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> から <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンスを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> から削除する <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> メソッドは、この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> から <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンスを削除します。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> は <see langword="null" />です。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.String" /> から削除する <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> インスタンスを表す <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> based on the <see cref="T:System.String" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> メソッドは、指定された <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> に基づいてこの <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> から <see cref="T:System.String" /> インスタンスを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: この <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> から削除する <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンスのインデックス。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> based on the index specified.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> メソッドは、指定されたインデックスに基づいてこの <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> から <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> インスタンスを削除します。
